attributes.action: Increase the level of earnings to £50k before 40% tax is applicable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The threshold for the 40% tax band is now too low. This needs to be revised as the average earnings within the UK are now £30k which means that the 40% tax is no longer a premium tax rate. This needs to be corrected and the level raised significantly.
